eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 12:07 AM ON DEC 7, 2025 Effective until 08:07 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County.  The Mesa Police Department is looking for 65 year old Manuel Shaw.  Manuel is a Native American male, 5 feet 7 inches tall, 225 pounds, with gray hair and brown eyes.  Manuel was last seen at 0940 hours on 12/06/25 on foot near the intersection of Extension Road and Main Street in Mesa, Arizona.  He was last seen wearing a bulky camo jacket, blue jeans and black shoes.  Manuel suffers from a condition which can cause him to become confused and disoriented.  If you have seen Manuel, please contact the Mesa Police Department at 480-644-2211 or call 911. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
